Definitions.Paraphrase:
a person who prepares (a newspaper, film, etc.) 
编辑
He is the chief editor of the newspaper. 
他是这家报纸的主编。

a person who favors futurism 
未来主义者
Futurists agree that these directions will grow as telecommunications networks become cheaper and more capable. 
未来主义者一致认为，随着邮电网络变得更便宜和有效，这些趋势将会增长。

1. bring out (a book, newspaper, etc.) 
出版
He has published three novels. 
他出版了三部小说。
2. make known in general 
发布；公布
The school published the exam results this morning. 
学校今天早上公布了考试成绩。

1. (on) put (a load, or punishment) on
把......强加于
The judge imposed a fine of $100 on the guilty man.
法官判罚那个有罪的人100美元。
2. (on) establish (an additional bill) officially
征（税等），处以（罚款、监禁等）
The company refused to pay the taxes imposed on them.
公司拒绝支付强征的税款。

power beyond human control that decides events 
命运
He does not believe in fate. 
他不相信命运。

a person who offers to do something 
志愿者
One of the volunteers died in the fight against the great flood. 
在抗洪斗争中有一个志愿者牺牲了。

offer to do something without pay or reward 
甘愿
She volunteered to clean the room. 
她主动打扫房间。

[U] the science of numbers; the adding, dividing, etc. of numbers
算术
He teaches arithmetic in that middle school. 
他在那个中学教算术。

of or concerning arithmetic
算术的
The pupils are taking an arithmetic test. 
学生正在进行算术考试。

say in advance (what will happen) 
预测
It's hard to predict what will happen in the new century.
很难预测新世纪会发生什么事。

1. the action or way of doing something 
表现
The teacher praised him for his performance in class. 
老师因他在课堂上表现好而表扬了他。
2. a show of music, a play, etc. 
表演
There were quite a few good performances at the party last night. 
昨晚的晚会有不少好节目。

concerned with or using electricity 
与电有关的；用电的
electrical equipment
用电设备
electrical appliances
电器

examination of something; analyzing 
分析
This article is an analysis of the main character in the novel. 
这篇文章对小说的主人公作了分析。
He based his decision on an analysis of the figures. 
他的结论是在对数据进行分析的基础上做出的。

discovery of the nature of a disease
诊断
I need to have a second test to establish the diagnosis. 
我需要再化验一次，以确定对我的诊断。

1. the act or way of dealing with a disease 
治疗
My cold won't respond to treatment. 
治疗对我的感冒没有什么作用。
Many patients are not getting the medical treatment they need. 
许多病人没有得到他们需要的治疗。
2. dealing with 
处理；对待
All visitors should receive proper treatment. 
所有来客都应得到良好的接待。
His treatment of the problem doesn't satisfy his boss. 
他对问题的处理没能使他的老板满意。

1. have an effect on each other
相互作用; 相互影响
You have to understand the way they interact. 
你得理解他们相互交往的方式。
2. exchange information or instructions 
互通信息
Millions of people want new ways of interacting with a computer. 
数以百万计的人希望掌握与计算机互通信息的新方式。

1. acting on each other 
相互作用；互相影响
There is little information that this encourages interactive teaching in the classroom. 
没有信息表明这会促进课堂上的互动教学。
2. communicating (between the user and the machine)
（人机之间）可互通信息的
This will make computer games more interactive than ever. 
这会使计算机游戏中人机之间比以前更能互通信息。

giving a choice from among more than two things
可选择的
They had a right to seek alternative employment. 
他们有权选择另一项工作。

a serious choice 
（必须作的）选择
If he wants to get to Chicago by tonight, he has no alternative but to go by plane. 
如果他想在今晚到达芝加哥，除了坐飞机没有别的选择。
You have no alternative about whether or not to work, but you do have a choice of jobs. 
是工作还是不工作，在这一点上你没有选择；但对于做什么工作，你是完全可以选择的。

a small sum of money that one has to pay in order to use a particular bridge or road 
（通过路或桥等的）费用
A toll road is a road which people have to pay to drive on.
付费公路是要付钱方可通行的公路。

a machine that turns power into movement 
引擎；发动机
The car's engine is out of order. 
这辆汽车的发动机出了毛病。

1. joining; uniting
连接	
computer connections 
电脑网络
2. relations between two things, people, or groups 
关系；联系
He refused to admit any connection to the bombing. 
他否认自己与那起轰炸事件有关。
There is no support of a connection between AIDS and smoking. 
没有证据表明艾滋病与抽烟有什么联系。

all the people living in a house 
家庭
Many poor households are experiencing real hard times.
许多贫困家庭正过着极度艰难的生活。

concerned with the management of a house 
家庭的
household costs 
家庭开支
household business 
家庭企业

1. protection 
治安保卫
strict security measures 
严密的安全防卫措施
The money I've saved is my security against hard times. 
我积攒的钱可使我遇难不慌。
For security reasons the passengers have to be searched.
为了确保安全，旅客得接受检查。
2. state of being secure 
安全
Living in such an area, he has no feeling of security. 
住在这样的地区他没有安全感。

in or all over the world 
世界范围（的）
He enjoys a worldwide name. 
他享有世界性的知名度。
The novel has sold 20 million copies worldwide. 
这部小说在全世界售出了二千万册。

1. a station from which one can get information through the Internet
网站
You may try some of the following sites for the information about the author. 
想了解有关这位作家的信息，不妨试试以下这些网站。
2. a place 
地点；地方
Here is the site where we shot the film. 
这儿就是我们拍摄那部电影的地方。
He went to the building site by bike. 
他骑自行车上工地去了。

a building where old or important objects from history, science, or the arts are kept and shown 
博物馆
The museum opens from 10 a.m. to 9 p.m. 
博物馆开放的时间是早上10点到晚上9点。

1. [pl.] useful things 
设施
shopping facilities 
采购设施
sporting facilities 
体育设施
teaching facilities 
教学设施
2. an advantage or opportunity
便利，容易，方便
A free bus to the airport is a facility offered only by this hotel. 
只有这家酒店为旅客提供去机场的免费汽车服务。

a computer's organization of information 
资料库
a database of hotels
旅馆数据库

1. the Earth 
地球
About 70% of our globe's surface is water. 
地球表面70%是水。
2. an object in the shape of a ball, especially one with a map of the Earth painted on it 
球状物；地球仪
Three large globes stand on the floor. 
地板上立着三个大地球仪。
The ceiling light is now covered with a white globe. 
现在那盏吊灯上装了一个球形灯罩。

a shop-keeper who sells dry foods and other things for the home 
食品杂货商
She is a Chinese grocer's daughter. 
她是个华裔食品杂货商的女儿。

[pl.] goods (usually foods and other things for the home) sold by a grocer
食品杂货
You can get groceries at the nearest grocery. 
你可以在最近的食品杂货店里买到食品杂货。
She came in the back door carrying two bags of groceries.
她从后门进来，抱了两包食品杂货。

the worldwide network of computer connections 
因特网
I got this information from the Internet. 
我是从因特网上得到这信息的。

something that one buys 
购买的物品
He was pleased with his purchase. 
他对自己买的东西感到满意。

buy
购买
He kept boasting about the new house he purchased last month. 
他老吹嘘他上个月买的那幢新房。

1. occurring in many places or among many people  
广泛的
It is a widespread belief that China will join the WTO. 
人们普遍相信中国将加入世贸组织。
2. wide open; fully extended 
展开的
She greeted her son with widespread arms. 
她张开双臂迎接她的儿子。

a number stated as if it is part of whole which is 100
百分率
a high percentage of babies 
相当大比例的婴儿
What was the percentage of children who were away? 
没来的孩子占多大比例？

1. a profession 
职业
Kate made nursing her life's career. 
凯特把护理工作当作自己的终身职业。
2. a part of one's life that one spends working
生涯
In his career, he wrote more than 100 short stories. 
他一生写了100多部短篇小说。

1. [C] the people who are in charge of a firm, industry, etc. 
管理人员
The management of the store decided to increase the size of the parking lot. 
商店的管理人员决定扩大停车场的面积。
2. [U] the act of controlling a business 
管理
Bad management caused the company's ruin. 
管理不当导致了公司的破产。

a person who has special interest or skills in a limited field of work or study; master 
专家
He is a specialist in diseases of the nervous system. 
他是位神经系统疾病专家。

1. the act of keeping safe or the state of being kept safe 
保护
The fence gave some protection against wild animals. 
围栏起到了一些避免野兽侵袭的作用。
2. somebody or something protects 
保护人（物）
Shoes are a protection for feet. 
鞋是用来保护脚的。

act of making dangerously impure or unfit for use 
污染
One of the big problems in freeing the city from pollution is that its citizens are using cars more and more. 
使城市不受污染的困难之一是城市居民越来越多地使用汽车了。

1. continue to live especially after coming close to death
幸免于难
We all hoped that the small boat could survive the storm. 
我们都希望小船能幸免于暴风雨的劫难。
Thankfully, my village survived the great flood. 
谢天谢地，我的村庄在那场特大洪水中幸存下来。
2. live longer than
比......活得长
Some people believe that only the strongest can survive. 
有些人相信只有最强壮的才能生存下来。

1. money gained 
利润
Did you make any profit last year? 
你去年赚钱了没有？
2. advantage gained from some action 
得益
Finishing college will be to your profit. 
完成大学学业对你有好处。

gain advantage or learn from 
得益（于）
You must learn to profit by experience. 
你必须学会从自己的经历中获益。
He hoped to profit from loaning money to make money. 
他希望从借贷中获利。

send out 
排放
The chemical plant emitted a cloud of smoke. 
那座化工厂排放出一股浓烟。

1. something that is sent out 
排放物
All cars must be equipped with parts to reduce emissions. 
所有汽车都必须安装减少排放物的装置。   
2. the act or the action of sending out something 
排放
The emission of smoke and ashes from that factory must be controlled. 
那个工厂排放的烟尘必须得到控制。

official paper allowing something 
许可证
work permit 
工作许可证

allow 
容许
Autumn's parents did not permit her to go out with her boyfriend. 
秋的父母不允许她和男朋友一道外出。

the quantity produced 
产量
The daily output of cars is 100. 
汽车的日产量是100辆。
碳
一氧化物

a set of ideas or principles that is used as a foundation for making decisions 
政策
The tight-money policy was also reducing the pressure on prices. 
收缩银根的政策也减少了价格压力。
The foreign policies made by the government work well.
政府制定的外交政策收到了良好的效果。

an act of surrounding a city, etc., by an army trying to capture it 
包围
Troy was under siege for ten years. 
特洛伊城被围困了10年。

1. seek to sell goods or services by giving public notice in newspaper, by television, etc. 
广告（销售）
It pays to advertise. 
做广告是会有回报的。
2. make public; give public notice in newspaper, by television, etc. 
公告；广告
When people lose something valuable, they advertise it in the newspaper. 
人们丢了重要的东西时会在报上刊登一则公告。

prevent by law or power; not allow 
禁止
Swimming is banned in this lake. 
此湖禁止游泳。

not allowing  an act or speech by power 
禁止
The city has a ban on parking cars in this busy street. 
该城市禁止在这条繁华街道上停车。

a small piece of medicine 
药片
Take the pill three times a day. 
这药每天吃三次。

1. (a feeling of) nervous anxiety, worry, or pressure 
紧张不安
Mother feels tension when her baby is sick. 
孩子一病，母亲就感到不安。
2. the degree or tightness or stiffness of a wire, rope, etc.
拉力
If the tension of this rope is increased it will break. 
如果拉力增加，绳子就会断。

1. order as a medicine or treatment
开处方
The medicine prescribed by the doctor produced no effect. 
医生开的药没有效果。
2. state (what must be done) 
规定
Good citizens do what the laws prescribe. 
好市民依法行事。

1. food and drink usually taken 
日常饮食
My diet is made up of meat, fish, vegetables, fruits, water, and milk. 
我的食谱包括肉、鱼、蔬菜、水果、水和牛奶。
2. any special combination of food eaten in sickness, or to increase or decrease weight 
规定的饮食
The doctor prescribed a juice diet for the sick child. 
医生规定这个生病的孩子吃流食。
The doctor put my uncle on a diet because he was over-weight. 
医生要我叔叔节食，因为他太胖了。

Definitions.PartofSpeech:
force on; place on 
强加于
The government would not dare to impose taxes on such needed foods as bread or milk. 
政府不可能向面包或牛奶这类生活必需品征税。

have (something) as the subject of thought or effort 
努力做......
He's working on a play that he started last week. 
他正在写他上周开始写的那个剧本。

in an increasing quantity or degree
越来越......
The public is growing to respect cleanliness and efficiency more and more. 
公众越来越注重整洁和效率了。

1. suffer the result of 
因什么而受苦
Sometimes you have to pay dearly for mistakes. 
有时侯你得为自己所犯的错误付出沉重的代价。
2. pay some money to acquire something 
因购买...... 而付钱
I paid good money for that bicycle: now take care of it. 
我是用高价买的这辆自行车，可要好好爱护哟。

give or send a bill stating how much money one has to pay for goods or services 
送交某人账单或罚单
He was billed for driving too fast. 
他因为开快车而被罚。

begin (something such as a business); begin working (in a trade, profession, etc.) 
开办，开设
He started up a successful car firm. 
他开办了一家汽车销售公司，而且很成功。
They were thinking of starting up in the fruit and vegetable trade. 
他们想做水果蔬菜生意。

as the usual rate or estimate
平均 
On average we receive five letters a day. 
我们平均每天收到5 封信。

in danger 
冒险
If they have the virus they are putting patients at risk. 
如果他们也带有这种病毒，那他们的病人就有危险了。
About seven million people are at risk of dying from hunger. 
大约有700万人面临着饿死的危险。

change (something or someone) from (a state) to another 
由......变来
He suddenly changed from a well-behaved child into a rough teenager. 
他突然从一个乖的孩子变成了一个行为粗鲁的少年。

in a state of being surrounded 
被包围
The city has been under siege for five days
这座城市被包围了五天了。

Definitions.Paraphrase: 纽约（地名）
伦敦（地名）
英格兰（地名）
欧洲（地名）
欧洲的
德国（地名）
